TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class SqlDataAdapter : System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDataAdapter extends System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter implements class System.Data.IDataAdapter, class System.Data.IDbDataAdapter, class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class SqlDataAdapter Inherits DbDataAdapter Implements ICloneable
public ref class SqlDataAdapter sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

summary.span: 表示一組資料命令集和資料庫連接，這些是用來填入 並更新 SQL Server 資料庫。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，做為之間的橋樑和 SQL Server 用來擷取並儲存資料。The , serves as a bridge between a and SQL Server for retrieving and saving data. 對應提供這個橋接器中的資料的變更以符合資料來源中的資料和，變更要比對中的資料的資料來源中的資料，並使用針對資料來源的適當 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the , using the appropriate Transact-SQL statements against the data source. 執行更新時，為基礎的資料列。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 每個插入、 修改和刪除資料列，方法會判斷已在其上執行變更的類型 (`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`)。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (`Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete`). 根據變更的類型`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`傳播修改過的資料列至資料來源執行命令範本。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 當填滿，它會建立必要資料表和資料行傳回的資料如果它們尚不存在。When the fills a , it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 不過，主索引鍵資訊不包含隱含建立的結構描述中除非屬性設定為。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 您也可能建立的結構描述，包括主索引鍵資訊的詳細資訊，再填入資料使用`FillSchema`。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using `FillSchema`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[將現有條件約束加入至資料集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). 用於搭配和來連接到 SQL Server 資料庫時，提升效能。 is used in conjunction with and to increase performance when connecting to a SQL Server database. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要使用 SQL Server 預存程序搭配 `DataAdapter` 來編輯或刪除資料，請務必不要在預存程序定義中使用 SET NOCOUNT ON。If you are using SQL Server stored procedures to edit or delete data using a `DataAdapter`, make sure that you do not use SET NOCOUNT ON in the stored procedure definition. 因為這樣會讓傳回的受影響資料列計數成為零，而 `DataAdapter` 會將它解譯為並行衝突。This causes the rows affected count returned to be zero, which the `DataAdapter` interprets as a concurrency conflict. 在此事件中，系統會擲回 。In this event, a will be thrown. 也包含， ， ， ，和屬性，以加速載入和更新的資料。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 執行個體時建立時，讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ， ，和一般透過參數機制會自動填滿從每個已修改的資料列的個別值的範本。The , , and are generic templates that are automatically filled with individual values from every modified row through the parameters mechanism. 每個資料行，您將傳播到資料來源上，參數應該加入至`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. 屬性物件應該設定為資料行的名稱。The property of the object should be set to the name of the column. 此設定表示參數的值未以手動方式設定，但會從目前所處理的資料列中的特定資料行中取得。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. > [!NOTE] > 如果會發生方法呼叫，而且資料表包含不是用戶端電腦上可用的使用者定義型別。An will occur if the method is called and the table contains a user-defined type that is not available on the client computer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立和 Using User-Defined 類型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492)SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。For more information, see [Creating and Using User-Defined Types](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492) in SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會使用， ，和從資料庫選取記錄，並填入與選取的資料列。The following example uses the , , and to select records from a database and populate a with the selected rows. 區域分布再傳回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成這項作業，方法會傳遞初始化，連接字串和 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體時會建立下列讀取/寫入屬性設定為下列的起始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |屬性Properties|Initial valueInitial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 您可以變更任何這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作建構函式屬性中指定的值為`selectCommand`參數。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 執行個體時會建立下列讀取/寫入屬性設定為下列的起始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |屬性Properties|Initial valueInitial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 您可以變更任何這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. 當（或任何其他的命令屬性） 會指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When (or any of the other command properties) is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作開啟和關閉如果它尚未開啟。This implementation of the opens and closes a if it is not already open. 這很有用的應用程式，必須呼叫方法的兩個或多個物件。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果是已經開啟，您必須明確呼叫**關閉**或**處置**關閉它。If the is already open, you must explicitly call **Close** or **Dispose** to close it. 執行個體時會建立下列讀取/寫入屬性設定為下列的起始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |屬性Properties|Initial valueInitial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 您可以變更上述任一個屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 取得或設定要從資料集刪除資料錄的 Transact-SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to delete records from the data set.

value.span: 在 期間使用的 ，用來刪除資料庫中的資料錄，其對應到 中已刪除的資料列。

span.span: A used during to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊、如果您將可以自動產生屬性並使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然後，您未設定任何其他命令會產生。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 每個資料行，您將傳播到資料來源上，參數應該加入至`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`參數的屬性應該設定為資料行的名稱。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 這表示未手動設定參數的值，但會從目前所處理的資料列中的特定資料行中取得。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定， ， ，和屬性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created a object. summary.span: 發生在已經針對資料來源執行命令後的 期間。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 嘗試進行更新，因此引發了事件。

span.span: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用，有兩個每個更新的資料列就會發生的事件。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 執行的順序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移到參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一個傳回的結果放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放置於。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同時使用和事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 事件會傳回此輸出：The event returns this output: 事件引數: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 狀態 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 事件會傳回此輸出：The event returns this output: 事件引數: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] 狀態 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用，有兩個每個更新的資料列就會發生的事件。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 執行的順序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移到參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一個傳回的結果放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放置於。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何同時使用和事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 事件會傳回此輸出：The event returns this output: 事件引數: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 狀態 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 事件會傳回此輸出：The event returns this output: 事件引數: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] 狀態 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 在 期間使用的 ，用來從資料庫選取要放置在 中的資料錄。

span.span: A used during to select records from the database for placement in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不會傳回任何資料列，資料表不會加入至，並會引發任何例外狀況。If the does not return any rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定， ， ，和屬性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created a object. public override int UpdateBatchSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property UpdateBatchSize As Integer
public: virtual property int UpdateBatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定每一次來回存取伺服器時所處理的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are processed in each round-trip to the server.

value.span: 每一批次要處理的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows to process per-batch.

span.description: 批次大小沒有任何限制...
There is no limit on the batch size..
變更使用的批次傳送一次作業。
Changes are sent using batches of operations at a time.

value.span: 當設定為 1 以外的值，與相關聯的所有命令必須擁有其**UpdatedRowSource**屬性設定為或。

span.span: When setting this to a value other than 1, all the commands associated with the have to have their **UpdatedRowSource** property set to or .
An exception is thrown otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定值，其啟用或停用批次處理支援，並指定可於批次中執行的命令數目。Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch. 使用屬性來更新資料來源的變更與。Use the property to update a data source with changes from a . 這可藉由減少伺服器的來回次數增加應用程式的效能。This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server. 執行極大的批次可能會降低效能。Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance. 因此，您應該先測試理想的批次大小設定，再實作應用程式。Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before implementing your application. 如果值設定為一個數字，會擲回小於零。An is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::SqlClient::SqlCommand ^ UpdateCommand { System::Data::SqlClient::SqlCommand ^ get(); void set(System::Data::SqlClient::SqlCommand ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.DBCommandEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來在資料來源中更新資料錄的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the data source.

value.span: 在 期間使用的 ，用來更新資料庫中的資料錄，其對應到 中已修改的資料列。

span.span: A used during to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊、如果您將可以自動產生屬性並使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然後，您未設定任何其他命令會產生。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護參考先前建立的物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，更新的資料列可能會合併與根據如何設定**UpdatedRowSource**屬性物件。If execution of this command returns rows, the updated rows may be merged with the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 每個資料行，您將傳播到資料來源上，參數應該加入至`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`參數的屬性應該設定為資料行的名稱。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 這表示參數的值不手動設定，但取自目前所處理的資料列中的特定資料行。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定， ，和屬性。The following example creates a and sets the , , and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]
